name: gen11nv
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wvd1(w0, wal(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wvd1(w0, wal(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wvd1(w0, wal(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, w1)

|- wvd1(w0, wal(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wvd1(w0, w1)

comment: Virtual deduction generalizing rule for one quantifying variable and one virtual hypothesis without distinct variables. ~ alrimih is ~ gen11nv without virtual deductions. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 12-Dec-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
